content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Running a manual scan Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection performs a manual scan in Data Loss Prevention policies in the same way as in Advance Threat Protection policies.
